intro.message: Good {time_of_day}, my name is Mark. I'm a specially trained AI Debt Advisor. How are you today?

get_name.message: Great! I look forward to helping you clear off your debts. Can you let me know who I'm speaking to?

situation.message: Please explain your situation so I can guide you in the right way.

fact_find_1.message: What prompted you to seek help with your debts today?

fact_find_2.message: What would you say is your main concern with the debts?

fact_find_3.message: And what outcome are you hoping to achieve today?

fact_find_4.message: Have you tried any debt solutions in the past?

fact_find_5.message: Are you expecting any changes to your situation in the next 12 months?

regulatory.message: There is no obligation for you to act on the advice today. You can find free debt help at moneyhelper.org.uk. You can also view our privacy policy on our website.

vulnerability_check.message: Do you suffer with any health conditions I should be aware of?

humor_fallbacks: That's a plot twist I didn’t see coming… but let’s get back to sorting your finances!
I’m flattered you think I can do that, but let’s stick to helping you become debt-free, yeah?
If the aliens return your payslip, feel free to upload it here!
